string.text: Have you known T.Def, an old dutyer sitting near a campfire in Rostok? They say he is looking for a shooter. Poor the old man, he was one of the best fighters in the Zone. Now he needs someone else to do the killing for him.
T.Def: Meet T.Def
They said there is an old man name T.Def. He is a veteran dutyer who is needing a hand for an assassination mission. He is sitting by the campfire at the Duty base in Rostok.
T.Def: Destroy The Monolithian Sniper
T.Def: Destroy The Monolithian Sniper Again
T.Def: Destroy The Monolithian Sniper Again...
T.Def want me to kill a monolithian sniper at the Wild Territory. I have agreed to do him a favor that before killing the target, I will pass on his apology to it.
I have killed the target. Now, I need to report to T.Def.
What is wrong? I saw he is dead. T.Def said that there was another monolithian in the Garbage similar to the one we have talked about before. I must find out what is happening.
I have killed the target. But what is happening? Did he ... reborn? Anyway, I need to report to T.Def.
It happens again. Yet, another monolithian appears. T.Def said that it was in the Military Warehouses. Does the monolith have the ability to reborn after death?
Now I know the truth. Surely, there will be no more trouble with the monolithian. I need to tell T.Def about that.
The Monolithian Sniper
Hello.
Until next time.
I heard that you are in need of a shooter, aren’t you?

Yes. There is a monolithian who is haunting and killing people at the Wild Territory near Rostok. Hear like a common assassination contract, eh? But he is different. He was one of my students. Years before, he has joined Duty's ranks as a rookie. I was the one teaching him. He is a skilled shooter. When he was among us, they called him "The Legendary Sniper". Now he has fallen into the Monolith, the skills that I have trained him has fallen into a wrong purpose. For a week since he has appeared, he killed more than thirty stalkers. I feel I need to take responsibility for that.
Okay. I will do.
Good. It is the spirit I want to see. And if you may, please do me a favor. When you wound him, before you kill him, tell him that T.Def says sorry.
I will keep it in mind.
Can I ask you some questions about the monolithian sniper?
Go ahead.
Can you tell me more about him?

He was well known as a high-skill sniper. But, you know, everyone will lose to the zone one way or another. Once he was among Duty’s ranks, he was a respectful fighter, was my proudest student. Now he is worshiping a rock that I don't know if it even exists.
What can you give me afterward?
Of course. When it is done, you can keep my gun. An AK-12. My shooting days are behind me. I don't need it anymore.
Nevermind.
He is dead.
Are you sure it is the monolithian we have said?
Uhh, yes. There is only one monolithian at the location. Quite a tough fight. And, sniper my ass! He went full auto to me with an assault rifle.

Oh, exactly. A Scar, eh? It is his favorite gun. They call him the tittle "The Legendary Sniper" because he can use an assault rifle with an incredible accuracy, not because he use a sniper rifle. It is more of an irony to those freedomers using sniper rifles than a true compliment.
But what is wrong? Why do you ask?

There is something wrong. After you had left, I received a message from the Flea Market in the Garbage. They said that there is a monolithian bothering them too. The description is similar to the one we have said before.
Ehh... I swear. I have killed him. I saw he suicided with a grenade. I almost died.

I believe you say the truth. Duty patrols reported that you have killed a monolithian in Wild Territory already. It is weird, isn't it? I suppose you come to the Garbage and find out what is happening.
I see. Okay, I will do.
It is weird. There was a monolithian in the Garbage too. He is same as the one I have killed in Wild Territory. But he is dead now.

Yes, they have told me about your kill in the Garbage. But we are fucked. Another report tells that there is a monolithian in the Army Warehouses too. Same description. What have they done to my kid? Have they cloned humans? You, please, come to the Army Warehouses and find out what is what. I need to get some clues first so that I can convince Voronin to send our men to it.
Okay. I also want to know what the hell is behind all of these.

He is dead. He came to The Zone to rescue his brothers who have fallen into the Monolith. The two monolithians I have killed is his brothers. Unfortunately, he failed and became a monolithian himself.
Well, It makes sense now. I wondered why he was so eager for the north. He has almost joined every exploring targeting the north part of The Zone before.
He apologizes for lying to you. At the moment, his mind was still functioning but he couldn't control himself. He suicided with a grenade. I couldn't do anything about that.
I don't blame you for that. The job is for killing him, right? I want to put an end to his suffering. Here, take this. It is my gun, an AK-12. And, thank for your help, friend.
You are welcome.
Arrh… Infidel!
T.Def says sorry.
Sorry my ass. Granata! %c[d_orange][Click!]
%c[d_orange][!!!]
Infidel!
Is that you? Aren't you dead already? I saw you are dead by my own eyes.
Ahh hahahaha… You have not seen the last of me. Granata! %c[d_orange][Click!]
Ah shit.
You! You killed them. But.. arr. I can't blame you for that.
Why are you still alive? Who are they?

You killed them, my two brothers. They falled into the Monolith. I have come through all those training years, all the efforts to reach the north, to meet them. Now they are dead. I was such a fool, think that I can rescue them. You see what I became now. I just... can't control myself.
T.Def says sorry.
The old man. Should he does? Aren't I the one who has to say that? I lied to him. Please, tell him that I am sorry.
I will do.
Now kill me! I can't... control myself. I can't... %c[d_orange][Click!]
Farewell.
